Pre-Game Insights: Both sides will meet at the AFCON for the third time in their history, with Egypt having claimed a multigoal victory on both previous occasions.
Egypt are unbeaten in eight head-to-head games.
Congo DR have struggled for results in the last few months and tend to play low-scoring games.
Both teams are yet to win their first game in the competition, suggesting a possible low-scoring match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This will be the ninth meeting between the two sides, with Egypt winning six and drawing two.
Nine of Congo DR's last 10 international games have produced less than three goals.
Others: Egypt vs Congo DR Betting Tips: Tip 1 - Result: Draw; Tip 2 - Over 1.5 goals; Tip 3 - Both teams to score.
